JOB DESCRIPTION:
The emphasis of this position is on working together as part of a team,  and develop strong Web based Solutions adhering to critical timeframes in ASP & ASP. net (Frame Work 3. 5/ 4. 0),  SQL Server 2008 R2. 

The Software developer is responsible for understanding business requirements as specified by the Project Leader,  designing,  developing,  maintaining,  modifying and testing changes to the web based applicationsDesired Profile The Software Engineer should be:  
* Strong in ASP. net (Framework 3. 5/ 4. 0) (2-3 Years of Experience) 
* Strong in AJAX Programming 
* Proficient in SQL Server 2008 R2(or higher) and Stored Procedures 
* Knowledge of MVC will be an Added Advantage 
* Proficient in Reporting to the Project Manager
